mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(name, price, quantity, manufacturer, member_id) VALUES (#{product.name}, #{product.price}, #{product.quantity}, #{product.manufacturer}, #{product.member.id});
mapper.select:
SELECT p.id AS p_id, p.name AS p_name, price, quantity, manufacturer, m.name AS m_name FROM product p JOIN member m ON p.member_id = m.id
WHERE p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{requestDto.keyword}, '%')
WHERE manufacturer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{requestDto.keyword}, '%')
WHERE (p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{requestDto.keyword}, '%')) OR (manufacturer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{requestDto.keyword}, '%'))
WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY p.id LIMIT #{requestDto.page}, #{requestDto.size};
